001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.dao;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Dao;
005import androidx.room.Delete;
006import androidx.room.Insert;
007import androidx.room.Query;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.entity.Score;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.entity.User;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.pojo.UserScore;
011import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
012import java.util.List;
013
014/**
015 * Provides CRUD operations on {@link Score} entity instances. {@code INSERT}
016 */
017@Dao
018public interface ScoreDao {
019
020  @Insert
021  Single<Long> insert(Score score);
022
023  @Delete
024  Single<Integer> delete(Score score);
025
026  @Query("SELECT * FROM score WHERE score_id = :id")
027  LiveData<Score> select(long id);
028
029  @Query("SELECT * FROM score WHERE player_id = :playerId ORDER BY value DESC")
030  LiveData<List<Score>> selectByPlayerId(long playerId);
031
032  @Query("SELECT s.player_id, u.display_name, u.display_nick_name, s.value, s.created "
033      + "FROM user AS u JOIN score AS s ON u.user_id = s.player_id "
034      + "ORDER BY value DESC")
035  LiveData<List<UserScore>> selectUserScores();
036}
